DOC.brief_summary: The widespread common use quetiapine childbearing pregnant woman demand data inform dose toxicity pregnancy . The new FDA Pregnancy Lactation Labeling Final Rule ( PLLR ) go effect June 30th , 2015 replace prior A , B , C , D , X category . Additionally , PLLR require information aid prescribing decision three category 1 ) Pregnancy ( include labor delivery ) , 2 ) Lactation , 3 ) Females Males Reproductive Potential . The pregnancy category include subsection describe pharmacokinetic pharmacodynamic characteristic medication pregnancy , fetal risk , data quality . The data collect study update FDA pregnancy pharmacokinetic section quetiapine inform physicians prescribe childbearing woman .
DOC.detailed_description: Bipolar Disorder ( BD ) Schizophrenia ( SCHZ ) pregnancy associate pregnancy complication increase maternal mortality due physiological psychosocial change independent SGA use . Untreated BD SCHZ associate increase risk placental abnormality , antepartum hemorrhage , preterm birth , pre-eclampsia , low birth-weight , intrauterine growth retardation , small gestational age , fetal distress , neonatal hypoglycemia , stillbirth congenital defect , potential adverse neurodevelopmental outcome . Severe maternal stress pregnancy increase risk offspring mental disorder , eye , ear , respiratory , digestive , skin , musculoskeletal , genitourinary disease congenital malformation ( i.e. , cleft palate , cleave lip ) . Also , BD SCHZ illness symptom link psychosocial consequence result poor perinatal outcome include impulsivity lead reckless behavior increase indiscriminate sex exposure sexually transmitted infection , smoking , increase alcohol drug use , less prenatal care , poor nutrition . Furthermore , woman recurrence mental illness perinatal period increase risk suicide , lead cause maternal death . The published case quetiapine plasma concentration pregnant woman include cross-sectional level woman 300 mg quetiapine across pregnancy postpartum . Compared six month postpartum , area curve decrease 27 % , 42 % , 18 % first , second , third trimester , respectively . Given complexity metabolism quetiapine active metabolite , important understand alter metabolism quetiapine active metabolite pregnancy implication dose adjustment . This study investigate longitudinal pharmacokinetics quetiapine pregnancy , delivery , postpartum . The long-term goal line research establish psychotropic medication dose algorithm inform longitudinal pharmacokinetic data improve mental health pregnancy outcomes mother serious mental illness . The primary aim : 1 ) Determine elimination clearance quetiapine major active metabolite , 7-N-desalkyquetiapine , across pregnancy postpartum ; 2 ) Determine effect pharmacokinetic change symptoms toxicity pregnancy postpartum , ; 3 ) Examine maternal-to-cord plasma concentration ratios quetiapine major active metabolite , 7-N-desalkylquetiapine .
